title.narrative: KGS/Conflict Mitigation through School Self-Governance Bodies

description.narrative: This pilot project aims at creating a positive learning environment for youth characterized by peace tolerance equality and other democratic principles in 20 mono and multi-ethnic schools in Osh oblast. This will be done by providing youth with practical t ools to identify existing conflict in their schools and defuse them in a peaceful manner and by setting up youth-led Conflict Resolution and Reconciliation Committee in schools to support student in their actions.The overall objective of the project is to create a positive learning environment for youth characterized by peace tolerance equality and other democratic principles. The specific objective is 1) to demonstrate that School Parliament can play a role in conflict prevention and resolution within educ ation institutions and 2) to provide students with the right set tools to resolve conflict situations in a peaceful manner. Description of the activities.a.One-day kickoff meetingExpected Output: A kick-off meeting organized.b.Establish six school parliame nts in multi-ethnic schools in Uzgen Aravan Nookat and Kara-Suu districts of Osh oblastExpected Output: Six school parliaments established in multi-ethnic schools targeted by the project.c.Development of conflict resolution manual for schoolsExpected Outpu t: One manual on conflict management development and published.d.Establish and build the capacity of Conflict Resolution and Reconciliation Committees in 20 schools targeted by the project.Expected outputs: 20 CRRCs established, 50 members of CRRC trained on conflict prevention and resolutionmediation and reconciliation.e.Facilitate the development of school code of conducts by the CRRC.Expected outputs: Three exchange visits organized for CRRC 20 codes of conducts developed.f.Administration of 11 small gra ntsExpected output: 11 small projects to improve the well-being of children and their communities developed and implemented by children in partnership with local authorities parents and other stakeholders.g.Research on the role of school self-governance bo dies in effective civic and social education of children and results dissemination Expected output: A research on the role of school self-governance bodies in effective civic and social education of children conducted, A national conference on the role of civil society organization in conflict prevention and conflict mitigation and resolution organized.
